org.drip.execution.bayesian

Class PriorDriftDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.continuous.R1
      • org.drip.measure.gaussian.R1UnivariateNormal
        • org.drip.execution.bayesian.PriorDriftDistribution

  • public class PriorDriftDistribution
extends R1UnivariateNormal
    PriorDriftDistribution holds the Prior Belief Distribution associated with the Directional Drift. The References are: - Bertsimas, D., and A. W. Lo (1998): Optimal Control of Execution Costs, Journal of Financial Markets 1 1-50. - Almgren, R., and N. Chriss (2000): Optimal Execution of Portfolio Transactions, Journal of Risk 3 (2) 5-39. - Brunnermeier, L. K., and L. H. Pedersen (2005): Predatory Trading, Journal of Finance 60 (4) 1825-1863. - Almgren, R., and J. Lorenz (2006): Bayesian Adaptive Trading with a Daily Cycle, Journal of Trading 1 (4) 38-46. - Kissell, R., and R. Malamut (2007): Algorithmic Decision Making Framework, Journal of Trading 1 (1) 12-21.
